com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.auth

类 AylaOAuthProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.auth.BaseAuthProvider
      • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.auth.AylaOAuthProvider
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AylaAuthProvider
    直接已知子类:
    AylaWeChatAuthProvider, FaceBookOAuthProvider, GoogleOAuthProvider

    public abstract class AylaOAuthProvider
extends BaseAuthProvider
    This class is used to authenticate login credentials via a 3rd party OAuth provider It does the following requests 1. Retrieve the Oauth Provider URL used for authentication from Ayla User Service 2. Retrieve Oauth provider authCode via WebView after user enters credentials 3. Pass authCode to Ayla User Service for login account validation 4. The response we receive is converted to AylaAuthorization object

      • getWebView

      • authenticate

        public void authenticate(AylaAuthProvider.AuthProviderListener listener)
        Retrieve the Oauth Provider URL used for authentication from Ayla User Service and then set up a web view with that URL. The subclass can override this method like for e.g. AylaWeChatAuthProvider overrides and implements its own method. In case the subclass does not override it the webview is not null
        参数:
        listener - The listener to be notified of sign-in success or failure.

      • authenticate

        public void authenticate(AylaAuthProvider.AuthProviderListener listener,
                         java.lang.String sessionName)
        从接口复制的说明: AylaAuthProvider
        Called by AylaLoginManager, this method should perform the necessary operations to sign in a user. On successful sign-in, the method should call the provided listener via didAuthenticate and provide the AylaAuthorization object with the necessary authenticated credentials.
        参数:
        listener - The listener to be notified of sign-in success or failure.
        sessionName - Name of the session for which this authentication is done. This is used for offline mode login

      • authenticateToService

        public void authenticateToService(java.lang.String authCode,
                                  AylaAPIRequest originalReq)
        Pass authCode to Ayla User Service for login account validation
        参数:
        authCode - 3rd Party oAuthCode
        originalReq - Original API Request
